text: Ani (musa) asa veli saharata ale, jevha saharavasi jhopalele hote. Ithe dona manase ladhata asatana adhalale. Ha eka tara tyancya samuhapaiki hota ani ha dusara tyancya satrumpaiki. Jo tyancya samuhapaiki hota tyane tya manasacya virodhata, tya satru paksaca hota tyancyakade madata magitali. Jyavara musane tyala thosa marala. Parinami to marana pavala. Musa mhanale, he tara saitani krtya ahe nihsansaya, saitana satru ani ughadaritya bahakavinara ahe
